String.string: Speak with Jerelyn in Freedom Plaza and Albi in Plaza of the Huntress.

Speak with {@LinkCreature:183#5000#Varlon} in Highwatch, and then travel to Exodor and meet {@LinkCreature:2000#50000#Dougal} in the Federation Reliquary Station. [If you complete the quest, reach level 70 and equipment level 463, you can start [Dungeon - 463] Vogzu’s Summon and [Dungeon - 463] Hidden Enemy. Afterwards, the quest [Important] Kaia’s Anvil will be activated automatically.]
